question:
Identify a renowned scientist of India on the basis of the below statements:
1. He had worked hand in hand in many projects with Vikram Sarabhai.
2. He gave significant contribution in projects like Satellite launch Vehicle (SLV)-III, Weather prediction model and setting Population theories.
3. He propounded a well known theory about heat and mass transfer between solids and fluid, which is included in many textbooks
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Vasant Gowarikar was Uncle of well known director Ashutosh Gowarikar. He had worked hand in hand in many projects with Vikram Sarabhai. He gave significant contribution in projects like Satellite launch Vehicle (SLV)-III, Weather prediction model and setting Population theories. His Garner-Gowarikar Theory is well known and also included in many textbooks.
